1196.53.text:

1218.81.text:

kneeling in front of you and showing you how
to tie your shoes, is perhaps the most vivid

1743.28.text: example we have in our lives today.

1746.28.text:
And oh, yeah, I told you I'd tell you what
my wife said when I brought that card home.

1758.92.text:
That poor man is going to get home, take it
out, and show his wife, and he's going to

1762.89.text:
say, 'Look, Tom Brokaw!' and then he's going
to look at the back of the card and see your

1769.12.text:
And he's going to wonder why Tom Brokaw’s
carrying around Ollie North's FOX News cards."

1779.45.text: Don't be mistaken for something you're not.

1782.42.text:
Don't be confused for something you'd like
to be.

1788.79.text:
God bless you and thank you for having me
here.
